Articles.Content:
The craft can be mounted with railguns on the wingtips, which can be jettisoned to save weight.

It can also be loaded with missiles, which sometimes (albeit rarely) detonate prematurely, causing serious damage to the craft.

Parts required: C7 Experimental, C7 2.16, JellyCubes Weaponry (MU-4, Forward-firing railguns)

However, if you wish to attack your own weaponry, we have attached the blueprints.

Noticed that it\'s very unstable during a high-angle turn or a dive. Not much turning ability, either. Seems to relatively stable, besides some roll, on level flight.

Personally, I haven\'t had much success with small designs like this, but I think that something must work. Perhaps add dorsal and ventral C7 tailfin parts instead of the canards you\'ve got on there. Maybe more control surfaces, but not placed using the symmetrical tool, since that\'d cause snap-roll. They\'d act as elevators, not ailerons, then. Should make turning easier.
Hmm, I\'ll try that when I\'m on my computer.

Like a fish, alright!

I likey.
